content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation with electrical_id 30052.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30052) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings: "out of fuel"; contains water (≈190.1 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); now linked to fluid_system 162227.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; fluid_system 162227.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 162227, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 162226, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 162239, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 162238, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 162234, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 162243, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 162242, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 162245, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 162246, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 162247, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
   - Repeated connection attempts employed fluid_system values (161563, 161647, 161729, 161813, 161895, 161979, 162061, 162145) near position (-5.5, 19.5) without finding any candidate pipe groups. Ensure that the active fluid_system identifier (currently 162227 in the updated pipeline network) is used when issuing connection commands.

• Search Parameter and Connection Command Mismatch:
   - The consistent failure to locate candidate pipe groups within a 15‐tile radius indicates that the search parameters (specifically the fluid_system identifiers) are not aligned with the actual configuration of the pipeline network. Update search inputs to reflect current network data.

• Repeated Aborted Connection Attempts:
   - Every connection effort aborted due to an absence of matching pipe groups highlights a systemic mismatch between connection prerequisites and the existing entity configuration. Verify fluid system identifiers against the final entity data and adjust connection commands to prevent further aborts.
